channel.title: Sigma on DFIR Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Sigma on DFIR Journey

item.title: Lab Setup & Telemetry Guide — Sysmon + Chainsaw + Sigma
item.description: End-to-end setup of a Windows DFIR lab with SwiftOnSecurity Sysmon, Chainsaw hunting, and Sigma mappings — ready for ForenSynth AI.

item.title: Random DFIR Noise Simulator — Building Realistic Detection Data
item.description: Creating synthetic yet authentic Windows event activity for Chainsaw and Sysmon testing.

item.title: ForenSynth AI Evolution — From Chainsaw to Visual DFIR Reports
item.description: Tracing the evolution of ForenSynth AI from the original Chainsaw summarizer to the Visual DFIR reporting engine powered by GPT-5.
